title: Love the UI, slow to update

Fortunately, I was home and was able to retrieve the package quickly to save it from being rain soaked. It was a cardboard box with food items inside, so time was of the essence.

title: Doesn‚Äôt really work...
text: First of all, the permissions you need to give this app (viewing and reading you entire email account), is always a bit worrying. I understand it‚Äôs how the app needs to function, but I still worry giving a third party access to all my emails. The biggest issue is that once you grant it the information, the app doesn‚Äôt really work. Hours later, it started to read deliveries that happened months ago. And the packages I did have on their way (2 of them) couldn‚Äôt be found. Even when entering the information manually the package tracking updates were missing. There were 2 updates that had happened while I was patiently waiting for Arrive to actually work, but eventually just gave up and removed the app and its Gmail permissions. Just use the USPS or UPS sites to track your stuff.

title: Disappointed with my over $60 dollar order!
text: I ordered 3 different kind of pecans. All large long bags. The pecans that were suppose to be large had a few medium size pacans on top and the rest were very small and got smaller further down! Especially if considering the price, this was a rip off! And the description is very deceiving, no slightly sweet flavor to any of the 3 bags of nuts! None!  Not sure when they were harvested but the last 2 bags doesn't taste fresh at all, the nuts have an old taste! My Mom asked why are they so little, and she didn't like the taste! Please be fair with people spending their hard earned money with your company! Glad I ate the 1st bag when I did, the last two bags taste very stale! Will never order again! These pecans are too high not to stand up to what's being advertised!

title: Perfect App
text: Does exactly what it says it does and does it very well. I‚Äôve had zero problems, and it‚Äôs the easier way tracking my packages. I‚Äôm not a weird bot or being payed to say any of this, just a really good app. I don‚Äôt normally write reviews but this app has made it easy to track the same package in multiple different ways with notifications. I know exactly what I need to know. It‚Äôs not the apps fault of usps doesn‚Äôt update the shipment as regularly as it should but this app makes it easy to access information about your package from many different shipping companies that work with usps, ups/ fedex or whatever

title: Absolutely Amazing! (updates)
text: I‚Äôve had this app since December of 2018 and I still use it! I items online around every week or so and this app is a literal blessing!! I‚Äôve never had problems with it! I love that I can include multiple emails so I can track purchases for both work and personal use. It makes everything a lot easier, I really love that I also get notifications when my packages have been delivered. Also, I love the feature that shows where my package has traveled and the information it saves about it, it‚Äôs a small feature but I like to watch it and see the little adventure my package has taken! 10/10 would recommend!

title: All in one place!
text: I like that all my orders and delivery dates are in one place! Sometimes I don‚Äôt remember the names from all the sites I shop at and this is a great way to keep track of when something‚Äôs arriving. I also like that you can pay in installments which makes it feel like your not really spending anything, basically free #girlmath and you can look at past purchases to find your sizes or reorder quickly! It also makes the checking out process easier because it saves all your info and I feel safer having personal info in one place instead of a bunch of sites.

title: Shop is good, when it doesn‚Äôt forget your packages
text: I enjoy using Shopify. It‚Äôs a really easy way to track my packages. Theres one problem though, every time Shopify updates it signs me out of my account, this by itself isn‚Äôt really an issue, but when it signs me out it also forgets the packages I‚Äôm tracking, and obviously I‚Äôm not going to remember the tracking numbers to be able to add them back. Even after I sign back in to everything I can, my packages don‚Äôt show unless I add them back myself, and I can‚Äôt, so I have no idea where my packages are or when they are arriving and I can‚Äôt even use a different website or app because I don‚Äôt know my tracking number and I don‚Äôt have the confirmation email saved.

title: tracking extravaganza with minimal useful functionality
text:
when I place web-based orders that have a "track with Shop!" button it's always a huge bummer. I give different emails to different merchants to make it easier to block spam, but Shop can only sync with one email address at a time. There's no way to have an account that just lets me sync my deliveries without knowing in advance that all orders that *might* use Shop use the same address.

I also don't want my order-tracking app to help me "discover and follow brands" or "find the perfect gift". I already know where stores are on the web, I want to deal directly with merchants, not with a spammy middleman.

If I could get a nice, paid app like Parcel or Deliveries to handle pre-shipment packages, I'd drop this app in a second.
